t24:applications.name: PD_PAYMENT_DUE
t24:applications.t24:allowed-functions: A B C D E H I L P Q S

t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Identifies the customer of the PD contract
Specifies the Dealer Desk handling the transaction
Indicates the limit that will be updated
Specifies total amount due for individual payment
Indicates total amount due for the type defined
Indicates amount repaid against payment defined
Delivery message types generated for this record
Indicates the frequency to send advices
Contract group based on a set of conditions
Method by which interest accrual is processed
Indicates whether to waive grace period PE
Indicates whether to waive grace period PS
The user who last updated the record
Date and time when record was input or authorised
Indicates the User who Authorises the record
Date and time when record was audited
Identifies the Customer for the transaction.

t24:applications.t24:short-description: Main contract file for Payment Due module.
